content: Great app. Like how you can look at graphs to see progress,over a week or month.  After a couple of days used started to freeze had to uninstall app.
replyContent:
The bug happens in the ad program of Google Play Services (GPS).
The GPS is automatically updated in the device, and this bug fixed in GPS 5.0.88.
When this bug still happens, can recover in the following steps.
"Settings" on the device → "Application" → "StepWalk" → "Force stop"

content: I downloaded and tried a number of pedometers before StepWalk.  This app has tons of free functions that otherwise apps charge for, and it isn't a terrible drain on battery life, at least not as much as some other pedometer apps.  Ads are unobtrusive at the bottom of each screen, and many are cute and in Chinese.  You can edit your step count, map a walk/run, you can scroll back and see your history, there is a graph ranking best days, a calories-burned counter, and more.  Perfect pedometer.

content: Should be a choice of measurement, also doesn't show my location when you go to map, sorry but must delete this, even with the network it shows me in the far east not in UK
replyContent:
Thank you for an opinion.
If you turn on GPS, the GPS cannot often pinpoint the position in a building.
And this application does not do positioning when you stop.
(Add)
When there is not yet positional information, changed  into the behavior that display the last location in version 1.15.
